name: Javascript-view
tagline: Firefox add-on for viewing javascript files
body:
### Welcome Javascript View.
Javascript View is a Firefox add-on to view javascript file on Firefox. It automatically deminify, beautify and add syntax highlighting for easier reading.

### Credit
1. [Rainbow](http://craig.is/making/rainbows) for syntax highlighting.
2. [Beautify.js](https://github.com/einars/js-beautify/blob/master/beautify.js) for deminifying and beautifying javascript source.

### Support or Contact
Contact me at rbudiharso[at]gmail[dot]com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
